name: Super Nova Drifters
description:
Super Nova Drifters is a vibrant fast paced two player competitive game.

Super Nova Drifters has the feel of an 80's arcade game with retro pixel art graphics and a high energy chiptune soundtrack. Use your shield, speed boost, power-ups and quick reflexes to defeat your friends. Change your strategy with each new level to give you the edge. Choose to play aggressively and go for your opponent's power-up or stay on the defensive and protect your own.
